attributes.action: Give MP'S a standard holidays allowance of 30 days a year like the rest of us!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A lot of MP'S have been stealing from us, their justification for this is they are badly paid,

However for the money they get there’s not many jobs where you get such a ridiculous amount of holidays.

Most of their constituents work all year round and so should they.

Mp's should not have more than 30 days holiday like us all while they are being paid by us the tax payer!
